means: 半导体的，有半导体特性的

sentence.Network_en: Doped silicon and germanium are technologically the most important types of semiconducting material.
sentence.Network_cn: 添加硅和锗在工艺上是半导体物质中最重要的类型.

sentence.Network_en: PETE devices require only a small amount of semiconducting material , making them cheap.
sentence.Network_cn: PETE设备 只需要少量的半导体材料,价格相当低廉.

sentence.Network_en: A collector or emitter of electric charge or of electric - charge carriers , as in semiconducting device.
sentence.Network_cn: 把发射器从集电器中分离出来的晶体管的一部分.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 美国乔治亚理工学院的科学家最近制造出单晶(single-crystal)的氧化锌(zinc-oxide)奈米环(nanorings)结构,由于这种材料是压电(piezoelectric)及半导电(semiconducting).
semicon 半导体semiconducting 半导电的，半导体的semiconducting ceramics 半导体陶瓷
a small , thin , circular slice of a semiconducting material , such as pure silicon , on which an integrated circuit can be formed晶片半导体物质的小薄圆片，如纯硅，在上面可以形成一个完整电路
it is found that the walls of some MWCNTs are all metallicand the other MWCNTs contain metallic and semiconducting walls .结果发现有两类异质结，一类异质结中的MWCNT的所有管壁都是金属性的，另一类异质结中的MWCNT既含有金属性管壁、也含有半导体性管壁。
